title: Best Font Sample Book creator
content:
New to this Forum. Trying to find the most versatile program to create a font sample book from the collection in our agency.  
Font management used: Font Agent PRO  
Purchased FontBook by Lemke  
any other suggestions???

With hundreds of fonts, I need to get 6 to 8 complete alphabets to a page in a readable size.

Any help appreciated

If this is not in the right category, feel free to move it.  
And if it has been discussed before, post the thread link

thanks

author: stuttle

comments.content:
Great question.

I have been using Extensis Suitcase and printing sample pages using the “Print Sample Pages” function. It works well, but customization is limited.

I would also be interested in seeing if there are any other programs out there that allow for more powerful layout options.

I purchased FontVista and it’s ok. I would like an app that will print a list of font names in its font style . With so many fonts I don’t want to print pages of a-z 1-10 at different sizes.  
Anybody know the answer to that one?
